channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pot hole, 6th December
item.description:
Pot hole in road from churchdown to Hucclecote
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hucclecote Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop, 6th December
item.description:
This bus stop needs fixing for numerous reasons: A) it’s outdated - the branding for the D is now outdated with the new Stagecoach changes that happened on the 31st August. B) the glass - it has broken and also has graffiti all over it Considering this is right outside Cheltenham Spa Railway Station that brings tonnes of visitors to Cheltenham it’s not very good.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: I have been reporting this for about 4 years the trees over hang my garden, 6th December
item.description:
Side of 47 in the summer fruit drops in the alley way the trees are leaf free now please could somebody come and trim these I’m beginning to wonder why I pay my council tax.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barnes Wallis Way, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A pothole in road problem, 6th December
item.description:
Two potholes either side of road 300mm x 300mm deeper than a tennis ball, No damage to vehicle
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin full by Friday evening, 6th December
item.description:
This bin outside the Trinity building, opposite Belmont Road is always full by Friday. It is on a major route to town, the races, football and Pittville Park. It overflows all over the pavement during the weekend. Please could a collection be scheduled for a Friday in readiness for the weekend traffic. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 98, Winchcombe Street, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The rubbish bin on the corner of Winchcombe Street and Clarence Road is overflowing by Friday so by the end of the weekend there is rubbish all over the pavement., 6th December
item.description:
This spot is on a major route to the race course, the football ground and tourist route to Pittville Park. Please could the bin be emptied on the Friday so there is space for all the weekend’s rubbish. It is not a good look for visitors to the town. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Clarence Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A number of potholes, 6th December
item.description:
A number of potholes all along the road around Oldest.future.focus ie the two corners into the housing have opened up.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockhampton Lane, Kingsditch, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 Large consequitive pot holes on Church Road, 6th December
item.description:
Just to the immediate right of the pavement on the side by the small driveway. Three large and unavoidable pot holes which are getting larger as weather deteriorates
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights not working, 6th December
item.description:
2 street lights in Hatherley Road, between the junction of Windermere Road and the junction of Heron Close, are not working. Also, the first street light in Heron Close is not working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 210, Hatherley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes around the first turning area in Orchard Rd. The road is clearly breaking up and they are impossible to avoid. This has been getting worse over the last few months., 6th December
item.description:
First turning area in Orchard Road. Outside house nos 10-12

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2A, Orchard Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes across the road surface, 6th December
item.description:
The issue is that the majority of the steeper section of the road is covered in potholes. Having to drive up and down the road on a daily basis has caused damage to both of our cars. Tires in 6 months) have unevenly worn out due to the tracking becoming misaligned due to having to drive down and brake continually whilst hitting the holes, plus the top of the suspension spring shattered off when having to swerve into one of the deepest holes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stockwell Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Between Kilkenny in and Clock Square
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Cotswold

item.title: Several potholes maybe 8 in total, 6th December
item.description:
One is narrow and deep .one is very wide and shallow .road surface is terrible .all at junction of vicarage lane and mill lane brockworth .previous repairs are failing immediately and whole area needs a resurface.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24, Vicarage Lane, Brockworth, Gloucester

item.title: Very large Pothole, 6th December
item.description:
In the road outside 71 Linden Avenue This was reported on 23/11/25 and supposedly repaired on the 4th Dec obviously it wasn't. Reporting again as there has been a near miss between a cyclist and a car. Very dangerous as cars swerve to avoid it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 71, Linden Avenue, Lynworth, Cheltenham

item.title: Long stretch of flooding due to blocked drain. Pedestrians getting soaked by passing traffic spraying the water onto the pavement. Water stays for hours /days after rain., 6th December
item.description:
Drain near bus stop north of Morans just before junction of Bath Road and Suffolk Road on the left side of the road when heading north. I have marked it on the map.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 109-111, Bath Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Slippy leafs on footpath, 6th December
